name: Make It Snappy
description:
Make It Snappy is a fun and frantic detective photography game which is a mix of Where's Wally/Waldo and Pokémon Snap. The game was developed over a three week period by Harvey Hayman during the National Film and Television School Games MA 'Code Camp' module. 

Note: the in browser version is a bit glitchy, just press escape and then make fullscreen again to resolve any control glitches.

Developed by Harvey Hayman 

Music by Rotem Frimer 

Sound Design by Joseph Russell 

Environment pack by Synty 

Character pack by Polyperfect 

Text animator by Febucci
